meanings.sent1: The lava flowed moltenly down the volcano.
meanings.sent2: The metal was heated until it glowed moltenly.
meanings.sent3: The chocolate melted moltenly in the sun.
meanings.sent4: Her words poured out moltenly, burning with emotion.
meanings.sent5: The candle wax dripped moltenly onto the table.

meanings.definition: In a manner resembling molten metal.
meanings.sent1: The sun beat down moltenly on the desert sand.
meanings.sent2: The artist sculpted the clay to look moltenly metallic.
meanings.sent3: The cheese stretched moltenly as it was pulled apart.
meanings.sent4: His eyes gleamed moltenly with determination.
meanings.sent5: The fire crackled and popped, sending sparks moltenly into the air.
